column4: Can someone PLS help me with setting up projector? I hv tried everything. It used to work on my old computer ok.
What have you tried so far that isn't working?
My monitor is 1920x1080 and Epson prjector is 800x600. I only get half the screen with the epson
What is the output of 'glxinfo|grep -i max_texture_size'?
I typed in glxinfo|grep -i max_texture_size but nothing happened
You have to install mesa-utils to get glxinfo..
What graphics card/driver are you using?
What is the output of 'grep -i driver /var/log/Xorg.0.log|grep -i nvidia' ?
are you still with us pls?
